content: If my people, who are called by my name, will humble themselves and pray and seek my face and turn from their wicked ways, then I will hear from heaven, and I will forgive their sin and will heal their land.
Cast all your anxiety on him because he cares for you.
This is the confidence we have in approaching God: that if we ask anything according to his will, he hears us.
Rejoice always, pray continually, give thanks in all circumstances; for this is Godâ€™s will for you in Christ Jesus.
Then Jesus told his disciples a parable to show them that they should always pray and not give up.
